mapper.select: select tmc.Id,tma.yh_mch,tmc.plnr,tmc.plshj,tmc.hpjb,tms.sku_mch,tmp.shp_mch,tmc.`start` as status from t_mall_product_comment tmc left join t_mall_user_account tma on tmc.yh_id=tma.Id left join t_mall_sku tms ON tmc.sku_id=tms.Id left JOIN t_mall_product tmp on tmc.shp_id=tmp.Id
mapper.update: update t_mall_product_comment set start=#{status} where Id=#{id}
